title: Join Students and Courses
description: Write an SQL query to display student names along with their enrolled course names using INNER JOIN.
expected_query: SELECT s.name, c.course_name FROM students s INNER JOIN enrollments e ON s.id = e.student_id INNER JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.id;
hints: You need to join three tables: students, enrollments, and courses
Use INNER JOIN to connect related tables
Use table aliases (s, e, c) for cleaner code
Match student_id in enrollments with id in students
author: Jerico Jimenez
